title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Value in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 7 data points.
Overall Value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Value in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, and lastly roughly constant from 2013 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Max Value in million U.S. dollars about 7757.4 was recorded at Year 2014
Min Value in million U.S. dollars about 81.0 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Value in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
